name: Cornwall Day Ranger
description:
CORNWALL RANGER Unlimited travel with weekday time restrictions for one day throughout Cornwall as well as to/from Plymouth in Devon and includes the four branch lines in Cornwall, 
      Looe, Newquay, Falmouth and St.Ives plus the Gunnislake branch in Devon. You can visit the heritage railways at the Bodmin & Wenford Railway at Bodmin Parkway and the Helston Railway by alighting at either Camborne, Hayle or St.Erth.

fares_and_restrictions.raw: fares & restrictions New fares from 2nd Mar 2025 One day ranger adult: £17.00 child (5-15): £8.50 16-17 saver: £8.50 family: £32.00 railcards ⯆ 16 26 SE DI 2T FF H V : £11.30 DC : £11.30 FF HM V child fare: £8.50 DC child fare: £3.40 Railcards ⯈ Railcards: 16 = 16-25 26 = 26-30 SE = Senior DI = Disabled 2T = Two Together FF = Family & Friends HM = HM Forces V = Veterans DC = Devon & Cornwall Previous fares ⯈ Previous fares (adult): 2024 - £16.00 2023 - £15.00 2022 - £14.00 2021 - £13.00 2020 - £13.00 2019 - £12.50 time restrictions Mon to Fri: valid from 09:00 but 2T railcard not valid until 09:30 No restrictions at weekends or bank holidays Also valid on the following : 08:17 PlymouthâPenzance [check with GWR] 08:24 Plymouth-Gunnislake 08:30 Liskeard-Looe train operating companies CrossCountry, Great Western Railway purchasing Online : ✔ Train conductor: ✔ * Bus driver: ✔ Station ticket office: ✔ Ticket Vending Machine: i Northern Ticket Vending Machines now sell most ranger and rover tickets but at the moment only for same-day travel (rather prohibitive for distant areas) Some Avanti West Coast station TVMs for example Crewe, now sell local rangers and rovers. LNER TVMs at Doncaster, Edinburgh, London King's Cross, Newcastle and York also sell them. A number of PTE areas sell local rangers from TVMs in their area e.g. South Yorkshire, Strathclyde and West Midlands * valid ticket to travel is required unless boarded at a station without ticket-issuing facilities

stations: Falmouth Town Gunnislake Hayle Keyham Lelant
St Keyne Wishing Well Halt Truro
